trans-unit.resname: The general stats panel summarizes information about your activity on the BEHAVE application.
trans-unit.source: The general stats panel summarizes information about your activity on the BEHAVE application.
trans-unit.target: Il pannello delle statistiche generali riassume le informazioni relative alla tua attività con l'applicazione BEHAVE.

trans-unit.resname: Here you can find the number of students you are working on.
trans-unit.source: Here you can find the number of students you are working on.
trans-unit.target: Qui puoi trovare il numero di studenti su cui stai lavorando.

trans-unit.resname: The percentage of categorized data indicates how many data you associated to a data collection phase. When an observation is done, the system doesn't know a priori if data is taken during o baseline or an intervention. You have to do it manually to have maximum control over your data.
trans-unit.source: The percentage of categorized data indicates how many data you associated to a data collection phase. When an observation is done, the system doesn't know a priori if data is taken during o baseline or an intervention. You have to do it manually to have maximum control over your data.
trans-unit.target: La percentuale di dati categorizzati indica quanti dati sono stati associati a una fase di raccolta dati. Quando un'osservazione viene fatta, il sistema non sa a priori se il dato è preso durante una baseline è un intervento. Devi farlo manualmente per avere il massimo controllo sui tuoi dati.

trans-unit.resname: This box shows how many measures you inserted.
trans-unit.source: This box shows how many measures you inserted.
trans-unit.target: Questo box mostra quante misure sono state inserite.

trans-unit.resname: The calendar reminds you the observations planned for today. Just click on one of the boxes to go to the data collection section.
trans-unit.source: The calendar reminds you the observations planned for today. Just click on one of the boxes to go to the data collection section.
trans-unit.target: Il calendario ti ricorda le osservazioni programmate per oggi. Semplicemente clicca su una delle righe per andare nella sezione di collezione dei dati.

trans-unit.resname: Here you can find observation data that has not yet been categorized.
trans-unit.source: Here you can find observation data that has not yet been categorized.
trans-unit.target: Qui puoi trovare i dati che non sono stati ancora categorizzati.

trans-unit.resname: The students you are working on are displayed here.
trans-unit.source: The students you are working on are displayed here.
trans-unit.target: Gli studenti su cui stai lavorando sono visualizzati qui.

trans-unit.resname: In the BEHAVE application, everything begins with the insertion of a student. Click here to do that. Please remember to not disclose personal information to identify the students.
trans-unit.source: In the BEHAVE application, everything begins with the insertion of a student. Click here to do that. Please remember to not disclose personal information to identify the students.
trans-unit.target: Nell'applicazione BEHAVE tutto ha inizio con l'inserimento di uno studente. Clicca qui per inserirne uno. Per favore ricorda di non rivelare informazioni personale che possano fare identificare lo studente.

trans-unit.resname: Click here to edit data if you desire to change something.
trans-unit.source: Click here to edit data if you desire to change something.
trans-unit.target: Clicca qui per modificare i dati se desideri cambiare qualcosa.

trans-unit.resname: Clicking on this icon, you will access the list of the observations defined for a student.
trans-unit.source: Clicking on this icon, you will access the list of the observations defined for a student.
trans-unit.target: Cliccando su questa icona, accederai alla lista delle osservazioni definite per uno studente.

trans-unit.resname: If you want, you can add medical information such as a diagnosed disorder or a specific medical condition. The behaviour you want to observe can be strongly influenced by it!
trans-unit.source: If you want, you can add medical information such as a diagnosed disorder or a specific medical condition. The behaviour you want to observe can be strongly influenced by it!
trans-unit.target: Se lo desideri, puoi aggiungere informazioni mediche come la diagnosi di un disturbo o una condizione medica specifica. Il comportamento che vuoi osservare può essere fortemente influenzato da esso!

trans-unit.resname: Did you make a mistake or, for any reason, you want to remove the student data from the server? Just click here to delete it.
trans-unit.source: Did you make a mistake or, for any reason, you want to remove the student data from the server? Just click here to delete it.
trans-unit.target: Hai fatto un errore o, per qualsiasi ragione, vuoi rimuovere i dati dello studente dal server? Semplicemente clicca qui per cancellarli.

trans-unit.resname: Clik here to add a new measure.
trans-unit.source: Clik here to add a new measure.
trans-unit.target: Clicca qui per aggiungere una nuova misura.

trans-unit.resname: Click here to edit the measure settings.
trans-unit.source: Click here to edit the measure settings.
trans-unit.target: Clicca qui per modificare le impostazioni della misura.

trans-unit.resname: Click here to delete a measure.
trans-unit.source: Click here to delete a measure.
trans-unit.target: Clicca qui per cancellare una misura.

trans-unit.resname: Click here to add a new observation.
trans-unit.source: Click here to add a new observation.
trans-unit.target: __Click here to add a new observation.

trans-unit.resname: When you plan an observation, the session of observation are automatically inserted in a calendar. Did you have an unexpected event and you have to postpone to observation? Just drag and drop the event in another time slot or day.
trans-unit.source: When you plan an observation, the session of observation are automatically inserted in a calendar. Did you have an unexpected event and you have to postpone to observation? Just drag and drop the event in another time slot or day.
trans-unit.target: __When you plan an observation, the session of observation are automatically inserted in a calendar. Did you have an unexpected event and you have to postpone to observation? Just drag and drop the event in another time slot or day.

trans-unit.resname: The data collected during the sessions of observation must be organized according to a single case design. Click here to define phase names and associate data to the right phase.
trans-unit.source: The data collected during the sessions of observation must be organized according to a single case design. Click here to define phase names and associate data to the right phase.
trans-unit.target: __The data collected during the sessions of observation must be organized according to a single case design. Click here to define phase names and associate data to the right phase.

trans-unit.resname: When an observation is planned and enabled, you have to inform the observer to collect the data about a behaviour. You can do that copying the URL of the data collection page or adding the observers' emails to send them an automatic notification via email one hour before the observation.
trans-unit.source: When an observation is planned and enabled, you have to inform the observer to collect the data about a behaviour. You can do that copying the URL of the data collection page or adding the observers' emails to send them an automatic notification via email one hour before the observation.
trans-unit.target: __When an observation is planned and enabled, you have to inform the observer to collect the data about a behaviour. You can do that copying the URL of the data collection page or adding the observers' emails to send them an automatic notification via email one hour before the observation.

trans-unit.resname: Click here to edit the observation data.
trans-unit.source: Click here to edit the observation data.
trans-unit.target: __Click here to edit the observation data.

trans-unit.resname: Click here to delete the observation. Be careful, deleting the observation, you will lose definitively all the collected data.
trans-unit.source: Click here to delete the observation. Be careful, deleting the observation, you will lose definitively all the collected data.
trans-unit.target: __Click here to delete the observation. Be careful, deleting the observation, you will lose definitively all the collected data.

trans-unit.resname: Do you need the raw data for your personal analyses or purposes? Just click here and download it.
trans-unit.source: Do you need the raw data for your personal analyses or purposes? Just click here and download it.
trans-unit.target: __Do you need the raw data for your personal analyses or purposes? Just click here and download it.

trans-unit.resname: Click here to enable the data collection. Until the icon is red, you can't do that!
trans-unit.source: Click here to enable the data collection. Until the icon is red, you can't do that!
trans-unit.target: __Click here to enable the data collection. Until the icon is red, you can't do that!

trans-unit.resname: Click here to add a new observation phase.
trans-unit.source: Click here to add a new observation phase.
trans-unit.target: __Click here to add a new observation phase.

trans-unit.resname: Clicking here, you can compare two observation phases (for instance baseline and intervetion) and evaluate whether your work to decrease a negative behaviour (or increase a positive behaviour) worked or not.
trans-unit.source: Clicking here, you can compare two observation phases (for instance baseline and intervetion) and evaluate whether your work to decrease a negative behaviour (or increase a positive behaviour) worked or not.
trans-unit.target: __Clicking here, you can compare two observation phases (for instance baseline and intervetion) and evaluate whether your work to decrease a negative behaviour (or increase a positive behaviour) worked or not.

trans-unit.resname: Click here to edit the phase data.
trans-unit.source: Click here to edit the phase data.
trans-unit.target: __Click here to edit the phase data.

trans-unit.resname: Click here to delete the phase.
trans-unit.source: Click here to delete the phase.
trans-unit.target: __Click here to delete the phase.

trans-unit.resname: Clicking here, you will be able to view the data of each session of data collection and to look at the relative scatter plot.
trans-unit.source: Clicking here, you will be able to view the data of each session of data collection and to look at the relative scatter plot.
trans-unit.target: __Clicking here, you will be able to view the data of each session of data collection and to look at the relative scatter plot.

trans-unit.resname: This section contains all the session data collected by observers
trans-unit.source: This section contains all the session data collected by observers
trans-unit.target: __This section contains all the session data collected by observers

trans-unit.resname: Clicking here, you can associate data to a phase after selecting the checkboxes near the data.
trans-unit.source: Clicking here, you can associate data to a phase after selecting the checkboxes near the data.
trans-unit.target: __Clicking here, you can associate data to a phase after selecting the checkboxes near the data.
